name: Nucleus-iOS
description:
The SDK listens for "trigger" signals from various analog and digital technologies.  These may include: Audio trigguers, BluetoothLE triggers, UURLs (deep links), "Touch" buttons, etc.  All these technologies are used by commercial intererest to transmit offers and promotions to an app on a mobile device.
Once the SDK senses a valid signal, it then forwards that information to the actv8me servers which will return to the app an offer or promotion, etc.
